statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions;
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM WeatherConditions WHERE precipitation > 0;
SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature >= 25 AND wind_speed < 10;
SELECT date, impact_on_farming FROM WeatherConditions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, precipitation, wind_speed FROM WeatherConditions WHERE impact_on_farming IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature <= 20 AND precipitation IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY temperature DESC, precipitation ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, precipitation, impact_on_farming FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature < 10 OR impact_on_farming ILIKE '%affected%';
SELECT id, date, temperature, precipitation, wind_speed FROM WeatherConditions WHERE precipitation >= 1 OR temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 25 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM climate_conditions WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT date, temperature FROM climate_conditions ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT id, temperature FROM climate_conditions WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT * FROM farming_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Planting'
SELECT id, date, impact FROM farming_activities ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM climate_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, activity_type, impact FROM farming_activities WHERE id < 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM climate_conditions WHERE humidity < 50 AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT id, date, activity_type FROM farming_activities WHERE impact LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM climate_conditions WHERE date = '2022-05-15'
SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, date, humidity FROM WeatherConditions ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, impact_description FROM WeatherImpact WHERE weather_condition_id = 1
SELECT * FROM FarmingActivities WHERE activity_start < '2022-09-01' AND activity_end > '2022-08-15'
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_start, activity_end FROM FarmingActivities ORDER BY activity_start ASC
SELECT * FROM FarmingActivities WHERE activity_name = 'Planting' ORDER BY activity_start DESC;
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_start, activity_end FROM FarmingActivities WHERE activity_name = 'Harvesting' AND activity_end IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT w.id, w.date, w.temperature, w.humidity, i.impact_description FROM WeatherConditions w JOIN WeatherImpact i ON w.id = i.weather_condition_id;
SELECT w.id, w.date, w.temperature, w.humidity, i.impact_description FROM WeatherConditions w JOIN WeatherImpact i ON w.id = i.weather_condition_id WHERE i.impact_description LIKE '%damage%';
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM farming_activities ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM farming_activities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT id, activity_name, date FROM farming_activities ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT w.condition_id, f.activity_name, wi.impact_level FROM weather_impact wi JOIN weather_conditions w ON wi.condition_id = w.id JOIN farming_activities f ON wi.activity_id = f.id;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -100.0 AND -90.0;

SELECT w.temperature, w.humidity, f.activity_name, wi.impact_level FROM weather_conditions w JOIN weather_impact wi ON w.id = wi.condition_id JOIN farming_activities f ON wi.activity_id = f.id ORDER BY w.temperature ASC, wi.impact_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherConditions ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FarmingLocations WHERE latitude < 0
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM FarmingActivities LIMIT 3
SELECT w.date, w.temperature, f.activity_name FROM WeatherConditions w JOIN WeatherImpact wi ON w.weather_id = wi.weather_id JOIN FarmingActivities f ON f.activity_id = wi.activity_id
SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM FarmingActivities WHERE LENGTH(activity_description) > 50
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FarmingLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_name LIKE 'A%' AND location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM FarmingLocations WHERE latitude > 30)

SELECT WeatherConditions.date, Farmers.farmer_name, FarmingActivities.activity_name FROM WeatherConditions JOIN WeatherImpact ON WeatherConditions.weather_id = WeatherImpact.weather_id JOIN FarmingActivities ON WeatherImpact.activity_id = FarmingActivities.activity_id
